oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Written Song Recordings - Tape 7
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The series of recordings features a variety of tracks written by Harlan Howard. The tracks are performed by a variety of artists including: Buck Owens, Ruby Wright, Waylon Jennings, Melba Montgomery, Harlan Howard, Jan Howard, Arlene Hardin, Dean Martin, Lois Johnson, and Kenny Price. The tracks are from a variety of unidentified dates.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) I've Got a Tiger by the Tail (Buck Owens) -- (02:11) Up The Path (Ruby Wright) -- (04:33) The Chokin' Kind (Waylon Jennings) -- (06:53) No Charge (Melba Montgomery) -- (09:54) Your Love (Waylon Jennings) -- (12:02) Sunday Morning Christan (Harlan Howard) -- (14:58) Evil on Your Mind (Jan Howard) -- (17:06) He's a Good Ole Boy (Arlene Hardin) -- (19:13) She's a Little Bit Country (Dean Martin) -- (21:38) To Chicago With Love (Lois Johnson) -- (24:09) Pretty Girl, Pretty Clothes, Pretty Sad (Kenny Price)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Harlan;
